lumberjack.ox

Class Lumberjack

The Lumberjack class represents a lumber jack
isOk Checks whether this lumber jack is okay
Lumberjack Construct a new lumber jack
sleep Make the lumber jack sleep for a specified number of hours
~Lumberjack Kills the lumber jack

Global functions

main The main program

Class Lumberjack details

isOk

 
Lumberjack :: isOk ( )
Checks whether this lumber jack is okay
Returns:
TRUE if this lumber jack is okay, FALSE if not.
Comments:
In the current implementation, lumber jacks are okay if and only if they wear women's clothing.
See also:
Lumberjack

Lumberjack

 
Lumberjack :: Lumberjack ( const wearsWomensClothes )
Construct a new lumber jack
Parameters:
wearsWomensClothes  Indicates whether the lumber jack wears women's clothes.

sleep

 
Lumberjack :: sleep ( const hours )
Make the lumber jack sleep for a specified number of hours
Parameters:
hours  Number of hours to sleep. Has to be integer.
Comments:
The lumber jack cannot sleep more than 24 hours a day.

~Lumberjack

 
Lumberjack :: ~ Lumberjack ( )
Kills the lumber jack

Global functions details

main

 
main ( )
The main program
Comments:
Gives birth to a lumber jack, have him sleep, checks whether the lumber jack is okay, and kills it.
